channel.title: Introduction: Nancy White
channel.description:
**Where on the globe are you?** Currently on Swinomish lands, outside of La Conner, WA
**What is your main gig?** Learner, consultant with wide ranging interests, full time grandma raising grandkids, chocoholic, gardener
**LinkedIn link?** Bah - just https://www.fullcirc.com
**What is your connection to OGM?** Lots of connections in the network...
**What part interests you most?** Smaller groups of people working on stuff that can flow in/out of the larger conversational context. Learning/Education, Antiracism, productive and enjoyable group process, stewardship of the big blue marble.
Extra credit: What are your superpowers? I do share my chocolate. I have wide ranging networks and I'm decent at network weaving and group process.

item.title: Introduction: Nancy White
item.dc:creator: peterkaminski
item.description:
+1 for chocolate! (And everything else, really. )

Read full topic
